items.title: Help our Principal take the Polar Plunge!
items.description:
Five days left until our Principal, Mr. Bickel, takes the Polar Plunge! That is IF the Pulley Warriors are able to raise at least $1000 before Saturday, January 18th.

Please click on the following link to donate:
